original_title: Wi単oy Xipantu, otra vuelta al sol
overview: The Wi単oy Xipantv is the turnaround of the year for the Mapuche People. It's a space of celebration, encounter, thought, religiousness and fight. It occurs in june, in the middle of the winter, when the 'mapu' (land) starts to reborn and the longest night lets the sun come in.
title: Wi単oy Xipantu, otra vuelta al sol
